alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Valleys; Northern Monterey Bay; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 21 at 7:19PM PDT until March 22 at 4:00AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM TUESDAY UNTIL 4 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected at prone low lying coastal locations across the coast during peak high tide Tuesday night into Wednesday early morning. * WHERE...San Francisco, Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore, North Bay Interior Valleys, San Francisco Bay Shoreline, San Francisco Peninsula Coast, Northern Monterey Bay and Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM Tuesday until 4 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low lying lots, parks, and roads along the coast with the highest high tides expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Storm surge up to 2 feet will raise tidal levels. Flooding is expected to affect areas similar to those that flood in King Tide events. The astronomical tide level is expected to peak at 12:42 AM on Wednesday.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; North Bay Interior Valleys; Northern Monterey Bay; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
